summary.span: 基底類別，描述概念模型中的基本型別。

span.span: A base class that describes primitive types in a conceptual model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[簡單類型 (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f387687-9372-49e9-8135-cc9650bfe539)和[簡單型別 （中繼資料）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4)。For more information, see [Simple Types (EDM)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/1f387687-9372-49e9-8135-cc9650bfe539) and [Simple Types (Metadata)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ddf09722-81b5-451b-a086-1dcf25a4f7d4).
